dublin_core.dcvalue: Type 1 diabetes occurs more frequently in younger children who are often pre school age and enter the education system with diabetes related support needs that evolve over time It is important that children are supported to optimally manage their diet exercise blood glucose monitoring and insulin regime at school Young people self manage at college university

An ongoing struggle: a mixed-method systematic review of interventions, barriers and facilitators to achieving optimal self-care by children and young people with Type 1 Diabetes in educational settin...
